game.l_dis:
G-Switch 2 â€“ Flip, Run, and Unlock the Secrets

G-Switch 2 is a high-speed endless runner action game that takes the gravity-flipping mechanics of the original to the next level. Run across futuristic landscapes, dodge deadly obstacles, and flip gravity with a single tap to survive the rush.

What is G-Switch 2?

G-Switch 2 expands on the original game with new challenges, local multiplayer for up to 4 players, and a unique progression system where players collect 7 secret orbs to unlock hidden characters and uncover the truth of their existence.

How to Play G-Switch 2?

  • Flip Gravity: Tap or press your key to switch gravity instantly.
  • Avoid Obstacles: Gaps, lasers, and traps require perfect timing.
  • Endless Mode: Run as far as you can while the pace intensifies.
  • Collect Orbs: Gather 7 secret orbs to unlock new characters.
  • Multiplayer Mode: Compete with up to 4 friends on the same device.

Key Features

  • Fast-Paced Gameplay: Reflex-driven gravity-flipping action.
  • Orb Collecting: Unlock hidden characters by finding 7 secret orbs.
  • Multiplayer Mode: Up to 4 players on one device.
  • Endless Running: Challenge your limits as the speed increases.
  • Unblocked Access: Play online instantly without restrictions.
